/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the clear blue sky, reflecting the city's modern architectural style. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
